info.title: RSYWX Library API
info.description: A comprehensive API for managing your personal library collection. Access book details, collection statistics, and more.

get.description: 返回书籍总数、总页数、总千字数，以及总访问量
Returns detailed information for a specific book including metadata, tags, reviews, and visit statistics
Returns the most recently purchased books, ordered by purchase date (newest first)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of books to return (defaults to 1)

get.description: Returns a random selection of books from your library collection

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of random books to return (defaults to 1)

get.description: Returns books ordered by most recent visit time (most recently visited first)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of recently visited books to return (defaults to 1)

visit_country.description: Country where the book was accessed

get.description: Returns books that haven't been visited for a long time, ordered by oldest visit first (most forgotten first)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of forgotten books to return (defaults to 1)

days_since_visit.description: Number of days since last visit

get.description: Returns books purchased on a specific date in previous years (excluding current year) - like 'on this day in history' for your book collection.

200.description: Books purchased on the specified date in previous years

location.description: Physical location/shelf code where the book is stored

years_ago.description: How many years ago this book was purchased

message.example: Invalid date: month must be 1-12, date must be 1-31

get.description: Returns books purchased on today's date in previous years (excluding current year) - like 'on this day in history' for your book collection.

200.description: Books purchased on today's date in previous years

location.description: Physical location/shelf code where the book is stored

years_ago.description: How many years ago this book was purchased

get.description: Returns daily visit counts for the past 30 days, useful for creating visit trend graphs

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to include (defaults to 30, max 365)

200.description: Daily visit counts for the specified period

get.description: Search books by author, title, tag, or misc criteria with pagination. All parameters are optional. Default: list all books ordered by id DESC, page 1

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Search type: author, title, tag, misc, id (default: id)

200.description: List of books matching search criteria

post.description: Add one or more tags to a book. Duplicate tags are ignored.

get.description: Returns books related to the specified book based on tags, author, category, and behavioral patterns

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of related books to return (defaults to 5)

example: 共同标签: 文学, 经典

get.description: Returns a random word of the day with its meaning, example sentence, and word type

meaning.example: The occurrence of events by chance in a happy way

sentence.example: It was pure serendipity that led to their meeting.

get.description: Returns a random quote from the collection

quote.example: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

get.description: Returns current weather conditions using QWeather API

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location (city name, coordinates, or location ID)

get.description: Returns weather forecast using QWeather API

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location (city name, coordinates, or location ID)

get.description: Returns reading statistics including books read count, reviews written count, and reading activity date range
Returns the most recent reading activities with book details, ordered by reading date (newest first)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of latest readings to return (defaults to 1)

get.description: Returns reviews with pagination support, ordered by date (newest first). Fixed at 9 reviews per page for consistent frontend display.
Check if the API is running and accessible

get.summary: Get WordPress posts for specific date
get.description: Returns WordPress posts published on a specific date in previous years (excluding current year) - like 'on this day in history' for your WordPress blog.

200.description: WordPress posts published on the specified date in previous years

years_ago.description: How many years ago this post was published

permalink.description: Full WordPress permalink URL to the post

get.summary: Get WordPress posts for today in history
get.description: Returns WordPress posts published on today's date in previous years (excluding current year) - like 'on this day in history' for your WordPress blog.

200.description: WordPress posts published on today's date in previous years

years_ago.description: How many years ago this post was published
